message.content:
Based on the lineage relationships provided, a path can be traced from Gabriel to Joan through a series of ancestor-descendant connections. Specifically, Gabriel is an ancestor of Russell, and through multiple steps involving individuals like Janet, Eugene, Joe, Alexis, Ronald, Dorothy, Diana, Abigail, Sara, Jose, Albert, Sharon, Laura, Teresa, Danielle, Gregory, Lauren, Jordan, Roy, Nancy, Aaron, Denise, Judith, Joshua, Pamela, Nathan, Dylan, Terry, Matthew, Alice, Brittany, Jennifer, Douglas, Christina, George, Catherine, Timothy, Olivia, Julia, Sean, Andrew, Carolyn, Emma, Amanda, Karen, Adam, Elijah, Ann, Jesse, Cynthia, Martha, Lisa, Nicole, Bruce, Sophia, Susan, Cheryl, Christian, Kathleen, Kimberly, Raymond, David, Angela, Jack, Charlotte, Beverly, Michelle, Austin, Frances, Donald, Debra, Janice, Kyle, Paul, Jacob, Diane, Bobby, Willie, Bradley, Scott, Sarah, Henry, Marilyn, Benjamin, Jacqueline, Helen, Thomas, Marie, Jason, Emily, Ashley, Jonathan, Barbara, Larry, Doris, Kenneth, Nicholas, Carol, Maria, Deborah, Shirley, Philip, Mark, Melissa, Evelyn, Michael, Gary, Brandon, Theresa, Jeremy, Carl, Virginia, Ruth, Linda, Anna, Natalie, Christine, Betty, Judy, Mason, Eric, Stephen, Gerald, Brian, and William, it is established that Gabriel is an ancestor of Joan. Thus, Gabriel is Joan's ancestor.

<ANSWER>1</ANSWER>
